78012c17-a2b0-421c-ae24-9703cf67a7ff.message:
Hello Jane,

I wanted to update you on my mental health diagnoses. I have been diagnosed with major depressive disorder since February 2023 and generalized anxiety disorder since December 2022. My most recent assessment indicates that my depression symptoms have moderately worsened.

Please let me know if you need any more details or if there's anything else you'd suggest.

Thank you for your support,
Mark

6be81b40-d2a8-4dfd-9b95-7450db2707ba.message:
Hi Jane, thanks for your support. Here is the formal release and sharing authorization form as required by the school: 

"I, as the legal guardian, hereby authorize the release and sharing of all relevant mental health diagnosis and treatment information regarding Mark Evans to Lucas's school administration and relevant staff for the purpose of implementing and maintaining a time-sensitive safety plan for Lucas. This authorization is given with the understanding that the information shared will be treated confidentially in accordance with legal and medical privacy regulations." 

Please review and let me know if you need any modifications or have any questions. We appreciate your prompt assistance.
